name: Dragonspine Spear
effect:
Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a {0}% chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing {1}% AoE ATK DMG.
Opponents affected by Cryo are dealt {2}% ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.
description: A Spear created from the fang of a dragon. It is oddly warm to the touch.
